message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it proposes a new formulation for neural-network-based language models. It could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it involves training a language model using a neural network. Additionally, it could be categorized under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as it involves developing a new approach for language modeling. It may also fall under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) as it involves the use of neural networks. Finally, it could be categorized under cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) as it involves learning word clusters with clear semantic meaning, which is a task commonly performed in computer vision and pattern recognition.
